title: Bali Central Highlands Hilltop Rainforest Retreat with Daily Breakfast, Lunch or Dinner & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Nestled in the serene haven of Baliâ€™s central highlands, this sanctuary creates peaceful environments for renewal amidst rice terraces, lush tropical forests and the stunning panorama of the Batukau Mountains.

Bask in uninterrupted views of thriving rainforest and soaring mountainscapes while relaxing on spacious private balconies and wading in the pristine lagoon-style pool. Elevate your sense of peace with indulgent spa treatments at 8LEMENTS Spa, rejuvenating yoga sessions or delicious international and Indonesian cuisine at Samiya.

When you feel called to adventure, let the little ones explore at the kids' club, journey to the breathtaking Lake Bratan, home to the picturesque Ulun Danu temple, take a walk through the famous Jatiluwih rice terraces or try your hand at rice paddy planting in the cascading rice fields right in front of your resort.
